nodes.bodyText:
Can we simplify the above two return statements?
i.e. return !isUnicodePrivateUseChar(c) && !isUnicodePatternWhiteSpaceChar(c);
I thought these checks are a bit more clear to compare with the specs in this way. And I referred the implementations of similar logics. [1]
Missing new line at the end.
Can remove escapeQuotedIdentifier() method as well
Add space between function definition and {
remove brackets for returning one arg
